scripts.clearnbuild: npm run remgendirs & npm run clear && cross-env TYPEENV='production' OUTPUTEXP=0 npm run build
scripts.clearnbuild2: npm run remgendirs & npm run clear && cross-env TYPEENV='production' OUTPUTEXP=1 npm run build
scripts.clearnbuild3: npm run remgendirs & npm run clear && cross-env TYPEENV='production' OUTPUTEXP=2 npm run build
scripts.clearnbuildloc: npm run remgendirs & npm run clear && cross-env TYPEENV='local' OUTPUTEXP=1 npm run build
scripts.clearnbuilddev: npm run remgendirs & npm run clear && cross-env TYPEENV='development' OUTPUTEXP=1 npm run build
